JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Housekeeper, Guaranteed Hours + Good Salary + Payment for all working hours
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a talented and super positive new team member for our housekeeping department in an amazing 5* hotel in the center of Copenhagen. (There is easy access from "Hovedbanegården" / Central Station.)

 

In everything we do, we believe in being sincerely caring and in building a worry free housekeeping operation, so that we can enjoy and deliver happiness.

Being an "Ellen" means to care for others; ensuring that those around you feel safe, worry-free and happy. In The Ellen Group we believe that our job is to care for our employees, and that our employees will then naturally care for our customers.

Our team is international and consists of friendly and positive colleagues and we speak both Danish and English (English is a requirement for this position).

 

We are looking for an experienced housekeeper...someone with a true eye for quaity and details or someone less experienced, but someone keen on learning the skills of an excellent housekeeper.

We are looking to welcome you into our family and to provide you with everything required for your to succeed and enjoy your work with The Ellen Group.

 

We are looking forward to welcoming you. We are looking for candidates who are:

- Sincerely caring

- Interested in learning and receiving coaching and committed to chasing perfection

- Motivated by enjoying and delivering happiness to colleagues and customers

 

Furthermore, we require you to:

- Live in or near Copenhagen

- Be able to work minimum every second weekend

- Be able to work around 20-35 hours per week

- Speak and understand English

- Be attentive to details and quality

 

Preferred start date is as soon as possible and we will interview and hire as soon as we find the right candidates.
